operating_fees.info: Value added tax is not included in rates.

parking_fees.type: Per hour and tonne of MTOW
parking_fees.info: Value added tax is not included in rates.

other_information: The arrivals outside operational hours are allowed only after previous agreement with AD operator (check of movement areas serviceability). Arrivals/departures of aeroplanes with total length grater or equal 9 m or maximum fuselage width more than 2 m is cleared only after previous agreement with AD operator (provision of rescue and firefighting service).
